## PickObjectType enum

Describes the general type of a picked object.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare enum PickObjectType 
```

## Enumeration Members

|  Member | Value | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  Area | <code>3</code> | An area object. |
|  Icon | <code>5</code> | The Icon of a \[\[TextElement\]\]. |
|  Line | <code>2</code> | A line object. |
|  Object3D | <code>6</code> | Any general 3D object, for example, a landmark. |
|  Point | <code>1</code> | A point object. |
|  Text | <code>4</code> | The text part of a \[\[TextElement\]\] |
|  Unspecified | <code>0</code> | Unspecified. |
